Responsibilities

As a Intermediate Software developer at Saicom Voice Services my responsibilities were:

  • Management Saicoms development team.
  • Managing all of Saicoms development processes.
  • Supporting all customers and staff members during their use of Saicoms APN.
  • Attending requirement gathering meetings for other potential Saicom Integrations.
  • Specification of Saicoms future projects.
  • To the best of my teams and my responsibility ensure that Saicoms APN and the Simble system have a 100% uptime.
